title: Simple Pleasures in Santa Cruz
description: Santa Cruz rules! Every year we take a trip up there to surf, catch up with friends, check out the Coldwater Classic and just have a good time. For some reason, this was one of our best trips ever to the place. Maybe it was the gorgeous weather. Or the fun waves. Or the outstanding crew that we had. Video by Matt Shuster

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText: Santa Cruz rules! Every year we take a trip up there to surf, catch up with friends, check out the Coldwater Classic and just have a good time.
